caption.p: Estimates of the proportion of transmissions from individuals in their first 3Â months of infection (early and acute HIV), before the intervention from phylogenetic methods on simulated PANGEA datasets. Submitted estimates are shown for each PANGEA dataset by research team and model simulation (panels) and type of data provided (either sequences or the viral phylogenetic tree, color). Error bars correspond to 95% credibility or confidence intervals. True values are shown in black.
